description: Rightmove Realtime Datafeed Json Schema for send property request

network.description: Information about the network calling the API

network_id.description: Unique Rightmove reference for this network

branch.description: Information about the branch loading this property

branch_id.description: Unique Rightmove reference for this branch

channel.description: Defines whether this is the sales or lettings channel for a branch: 1 Sales 2 Lettings

overseas.description: Flag to identify whether a property is UK or Overseas

property.description: Information about the property being sent

agent_ref.description: Agent's unique reference for this property

published.description: Defines whether this property should be visible on Rightmove

property_type.description: The type of the property being sent in this message: 0 Not Specified, 1 Terraced House, 2 End of terrace house, 3 Semi-detached house, 4 Detached house, 5 Mews house, 6 facilities, 538 Spa, 541 Campsite & Holiday Village

status.description: The current transaction status for this property: 1 Available, 2 SSTC, 3 SSTCM, 4 Under Offer, 5 Reserved, 6 Let Agreed

new_home.description: Defines whether this property is a new build

student_property.description: Defines whether this property is available for student lettings

house_flat_share.description: Defines whether this advert is for a house/flat share

create_date.description: Date this property was created in the format: dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss

update_date.description: Date this property was last updated in the feed provider's software, in the format: dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss

date_available.description: Date a rental property is available in the format: dd-MM-yyyy

contract_months.description: Length of rental contract in months

minimum_term.description: Minimum term for the rental contract in months

let_type.description: The type of rental contract available for this property: 1 Long term, 2 Short term, 4 Commercial, 0 Not specified

address.description: Information about the address of the property being sent

house_name_number.description: The first line of the address including the property name or number

address_2.description: The second line of the address for this property

address_3.description: The third line of the address for this property

address_4.description: The fourth line of the address for this property

town.description: The town in which the property is located

postcode_1.description: The first half of the post code for the property being sent

postcode_2.description: The second half of the post code for the property being sent

display_address.description: The address which should be displayed for the property being sent

latitude.description: The exact latitude of the property

longitude.description: The exact longitude of the property

pov_latitude.description: The latitude for the google streetview camera

pov_longitude.description: The longitude for the google streetview camera

pov_pitch.description: The pitch for the google streetview camera

pov_heading.description: The heading for the google streetview camera

pov_zoom.description: The zoom level for the google streetview camera

price_information.description: Information about the price of the property being sent

price.description: The price of the property being sent

price_qualifier.description: The qualifier on the advertised price of the property being sent: 0 Default, 1 POA, 2 Guide Price, 3 Fixed Price, 4 Offers in excess of, 5 OIRO, 6 Sale by Tender, 7 From, 9 Shared Ownership, 10 Offers over, 11 Part Buy, Part Rent, 12 Shared Equity, 16 Coming Soon

deposit.description: The deposit required for rental of the property being sent

administration_fee.description: The admin fee required for the rental contract of the property being sent

rent_frequency.description: The frequency of rental payments for the property being sent: 1 Yearly, 4 Quarterly, 12 Monthly, 52 Weekly, 365 Daily

tenure_type.description: The tenure type for the sale of the property being sent: 1 Freehold, 2 Leasehold, 3 Feudal, 4 Commonhold, 5 Share of Freehold

auction.description: Indicates if this property is being sold at auction

tenure_unexpired_years.description: The number of years left on the tenure of this property

price_per_unit_area.description: The price per unit area of the property being sent

details.description: The details about the property being sent

summary.description: The summary description of the property being sent

description.description: The full description of the property being sent

features.description: Features of the property being sent

bedrooms.description: The number of bedrooms for the property being sent

bathrooms.description: The number of bathrooms for the property being sent

reception_rooms.description: The number of reception rooms for the property being sent

parking.description: Parking options available for the property being sent: 13 Allocated, 14 Communal, 15 Covered, 16 Garage, 17 Driveway, 18 Gated, 19 Off Street, 20 On Street, 21 Rear, 22 Permit, 23 Private, 24 Residents

outside_space.description: Outside spaces associated with the property being sent: 29 Back Garden, 30 Communal Garden, 31 Enclosed Garden, 32 Front Garden, 33 Private Garden, 34 Rear Garden, 35 Terrace, 36 Patio

year_built.description: The year in which the property being sent was built

internal_area.description: Total internal area of the property being sent

internal_area_unit.description: Units which the internal area is sent in: 1 sq ft 2 sq m 3 acre 4 hectares

land_area.description: Total land area of the property being sent

land_area_unit.description: Units which the land area is sent in: 1 sq ft 2 sq m 3 acre 4 hectares

floors.description: Number of floors in the property being sent

entrance_floor.description: Floor which the entrance to the property being sent is on: 1 Basement, 2 Ground Floor, 3 1st Floor, 4 2nd Floor, 5 Higher than 2nd floor (no lift), 6 Higher than 2nd floor (with lift)

condition.description: Condition of the property being sent: 1 Good, 2 Some work needed, 3 Work required throughout, 4 Major renovation required

accessibility.description: Accessibility measures in place in the property being sent: 42 Not suitable for wheelchair users, 37 Level access, 38 Lift access, 39 Ramped access, 40 Wet room, 41 Wide doorways

heating.description: Heating related features of the property being sent: 1 Air Conditioning, 2 Central, 3 Double Glazing, 4 Eco-Friendly, 5 Electric, 6 Gas, 7 Gas Central, 8 Night Storage, 9 Oil, 10 Solar, 11 Solar Water, 12 Under Floor

furnished_type.description: Is furnishing included in the rental of the property being sent: 0 Furnished, 1 Part-furnished, 2 Unfurnished, 4 Furnished/Unfurnished

pets_allowed.description: Are pets permitted in the property being sent

smokers_considered.description: Are smokers considered for the property being sent

housing_benefit_considered.description: Are people on housing benefit considered for the property being sent

sharers_considered.description: Are sharers considered for the property being sent

burglar_alarm.description: Is there a burglar alarm in the property being sent

washing_machine.description: Is there a washing machine in the property being sent

dishwasher.description: Is there a dishwasher in the property being sent

all_bills_inc.description: Are bills included in the rental price of the property being sent

water_bill_inc.description: Is the water bill included in the rental price of the property being sent

gas_bill_inc.description: Is the gas bill included in the rental price of the property being sent

electricity_bill_inc.description: Is the electricity bill included in the rental price of the property being sent

oil_bill_inc.description: Is the oil bill included in the rental price of the property being sent

council_tax_inc.description: Is council tax included in the rental price of the property being sent

tv_licence_inc.description: Is the tv licence included in the rental price of the property being sent

sat_cable_tv_bill_inc.description: Is satellite or cable TV included in the rental price of the property being sent

internet_bill_inc.description: Is the internet bill included in the rental price of the property being sent

business_for_sale.description: Is there a business for sale with the commercial property being sent

comm_use_class.description: The commercial use class(es) of the property being sent: 1 A1 Shops, 4 A2 Financial and Professional Services, 7 A3 Restaurants and Cafes, 10 A4 Drinking Establishments, 13 A5 Hot Food Take away, 16 B1 Business, 19 B2 General Industrial, 22 B8 Storage and Distribution, 25 C1 Hotels, 28 C2 Residential Institutions, 31 C2A Secure Residential Institution, 34 C3 Dwelling Houses, 37 D1 Non-Residential Institutions, 40 D2 Assembly and Leisure, 43 Sui_generis_1, 46 Sui_generis_2

rooms.description: Room data for the property being sent

room_description.description: The specific description of that room

room_dimension_unit.description: The units which the length and width of the room have been provided in: 5 Metres, 6 Centimetres, 7 Millimetres, 8 Feet, 9 Inches

room_dimension_text.description: Any additional description or clarification of the room dimensions

room_photo_urls.description: The URLs of images which should be associated with this room

media.description: The media for the property being sent

media_type.description: The type of media which is being sent: 1 Image, 2 Floorplan, 3 Brochure, 4 Virtual Tour, 5 Audio Tour, 6 EPC, 7 EPC Graph

media_url.description: The URL to retrieve this piece of media from

caption.description: The caption to be displayed for this piece of media

sort_order.description: The display order for this piece of media

media_update_date.description: The date the media at this URL was last updated in the format: dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss

principal.description: Details of the principal for the property being sent

principal_email_address.description: The email address for the principal for this property

auto_email_when_live.description: Should the principal be emailed when this property is live on Rightmove

auto_email_updates.description: Should the principal be emailed when this property is updated on Rightmove
